name: The Helena Bonham Carter
description: Named for the 2011 best supporting actress Oscar nominee (for "The King's Speech") and created by Meaghan Dorman of Raines Law Room.
keywords: absinthe, apricot liqueur, cocchi apertivo americano, plymouth gin
recipeIngredient: absinthe, to rinse the interior of the glass

recipeInstructions.text: First swirl some absinthe in a glass, then pour it out. Next, combine three-fourths of an ounce of apricot liqueur, an ounce of Cocchi Aperitivo Americano and one and a half ounces of Plymouth gin. Stir with ice and strain into the glass. Spritz with lemon peel oil (by squeezing a zest of lemon over the drink) and garnish with a twist of lemon peel.
